characterDescription: Vono is a guardsman in the cabin of Yanagawn’s ship.

characterDetails.History:
He holds a cloth to the side of his face and winces as he gives the formal bow of admittance to the emperor.
He claims that Lift kicked him in his spheres and stuffed him under a bed. He doesn’t know just how she moved him, stating that she’s not real big.
He had been charged by Noura to keep Lift busy and distracted.
